about.title: My Advantage
about.description1: I'm a aspiring web developer/ software engineer, artist, music producer, and multi-instrumentalist.
about.description2: After completing a full-stack coding bootcamp from Rutger's University in 2021 I have been free-lancing making web sites and applications for clients.
about.description3a: I am currently looking for a full-time position as a front end software engineer
about.description4: You can reach me at cliffthedev@gmail.com
